name: All You Ever Wallet ♥ pdf / e-book sewing pattern
description: Create your own, unique wallet - Choose from 3 different variations to suit your mood, your needs and your style. Finished size ca. 10 x 18 cm (closed). Enjoy the process of making your own piece of useable art and be happy everytime you use your finished creation… Everything will fit in there... made from fine fabrics this wallet may also be used as an evening clutch. ^-^ - Fat-quarter-friendly - A wonderful possibility to use up some scraps. - Pattern pieces are in full size - no resizing necessary. - Seam allowances included. - For an average sewer a simple version is do-able in less than 2 hours. - Makes a great last-minute-present and a great "wrap" for a gift of money (nicer than an envelope, don't you agree?!) The pdf file is delivered within 48 hrs after the payment is through. The pattern is available in german and english language. Please not that the pattern is for personal use only! ****** You can't sew? Don't cry! On request I sew these lovelies - just contact me, a question is for free! ;)
